```{r Setup_Libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(pander)
```

```{r get_Schedule}

cp <- paste(
    "Weekly Schedule of Meetings for the Bioinformatics Hub",
    "Meetings are held the The Braggs 3.13/3.14 from 2:00pm to 3:30pm"
    )

readxl::read_excel("WeeklyMeetings.xlsx", col_types = c("date","text","text","text","text","text","text","text")) %>%
  rename(" " = "space") %>%
  replace_na(list(Who = " ",Group = " ", 'Group A' = " ", 'Group B' = " ", 'Group C' = " ", ' ' = "|")) %>%
  pander(caption = cp, split.table = Inf)
  

```
